overall.description: Create a boolean mask from an array.

copy.description: Whether to return a copy of m (True) or m itself (False).

shrink.description: Whether to shrink m to nomask if all its values are False.

dtype.description: Data-type of the output mask. By default, the output mask has a dtype of MaskType (bool). If the dtype is flexible, each field has a boolean dtype. This is ignored when m is nomask, in which case nomask is always returned.

result.description: A boolean mask derived from m.
